data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ruiz, Gustavo R. S., Bustamante, Abel A. (2016): Edwardsya, a new genus of jumping spiders from South America (Araneae: Salticidae: Freyina). Zootaxa 4184 (1): 117-129, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4184.1.7|7 occurrences
